# Appendix - Undergrad and Graduate Projects
## PhD Project Abstract
```{r phd_project}
vroom::vroom('data/project_abstracts.csv') %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(when)) %>%
  dplyr::filter(display == T) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(type == 'phd_project') %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(what = authors, when, with = title, where, why)
```
